评论详情: Stylish and comfortable. Top stays in place with the strip they’ve placed inside so don’t have to worry about constantly adjusting it. Order your size.
Loved the top and fabric, feel and fit. Wish it were a couple inches longer
So cute, love the material, and the way they fit!! I will order again in different colors

They're cute but I wouldn't purchase in any other colors again. When I took them out of the package they had a really strong and weird smell that takes a couple washes to get out. They're also not super flattering, I have tube tops from skims, aritzia and even amazon that contour my body perfectly, these are kind of boxy. A good thing about these tube tops is that they're a thick material if that's what you're looking for. They also have a band at the top that keeps the tube tops from slipping down however if you sweat or wear it too long, they do start hurting!
I love it through it to layer with or wear on its own

This became my new favorite top to wear in the warmer months. The tops are thick and great quality for an Amazon top. I don't have to wear a bra with these and I got a Large (I am 36C). Very comfortable, I've worn them around at home. They are really cute and they are both my school colors so I got lots of compliments on them when I wore them to home games. The black does not fade with washes, and I've washed them after every use. I would recommend washing on a delicate cycle and hang drying. True to size, I would get your normal shirt size for a normal fit and size down for a tighter fit. The non-slip detail on the top of the shirt works very well, I really didn't think it would. This is why I feel like I didn't need to size down. Highly recommend, will be buying in more colors next summer.
Order up
They are cute but in my opinion bunch weird on the sides. They kind of look weird when not with the write outfit but I would recommend sizing down.
Love OQQ. These tube tops actually stay up as there is a silicone type band at the top!
For me, they weren’t that flattering on my body, wouldn’t recommend for bigger chest girlies. Otherwise these are a good buy!
Very comfortable stays up

They fit perfect and they come with a rubber strip on the top for them to stay. I love it

Love them they’re comfortable

These are cute tops. I only have 3 stars because I am a 34D and there is not much support up there.

can’t upload a photo because geek squad lost every photo I’ve taken from this year, but I love this brand. I’m busty, so it’s difficult finding tops that are flattering and fit well— every top I’ve bought has been a 10/10. I’ve washed them too and no issues there either.

The shirts are stretchy And although they are thicker material, they are very comfortable. I like the rubber Band along the top so they don’t fall down. And the roofing on the side, makes it more of a fun shirt to wear out!
Bought for my daughter. She’s 107 lbs 4’10”. She loves these!! Great quality at a great price!!! Def recommend!

评论概述: Great fabric, love the slip proof top!
评论详情: I was pleasantly surprised with this top, I didn’t know how thin it was going to be, but it’s good quality . If you don’t wear a bra, your nips will still show, but it’s for sure not see through. Perfect addition to a cute pair of baggy jeans. I’d definitely recommend

Love these tops, stay up easy and have the strip inside that keeps them from moving. Stretchy/supportive material that made it easy to wear without a bra (very small chest). Slightly cropped but could be tucked into jeans or pants.
good quality of material, not transparent, very cute and trendy top, however it is not double lined!

Super comfortable, I love the colors. I am a bigger chested woman and this does not fall AT ALL. It stays up, it rarely shifts and turns around, the fit is true to size, and I love to use it as both a layering piece and a top itself. The material is soft and I am looking to buy more for more color options.
I wear them all the time. They fit so well and they have a rubber inseam that prevents them from sliding around. Material is thick like activewear, so you feel supported and protected.

i love these tops! the fabric is so stretchy and comfy, and the rubber lining helps keep my top to stay in place. i like to wear these with casual fits, to workout in, and to dress up in too (: so versatile!
The rubber part irritated me. The part that helps keeps the tube top from sliding

Love the color of the red but there is no support at all. imI cant wear this top without a bra unfortunately. if it had more hold, would definitely be giving it a 5 star. also, a lot of side boob spillage. this top makes even more apparent for some reason.
My kids are in hula and it stayed in place throughout their show!! Good quality!!

I LOVE these tops, they fit incredibly well, very true to size and you can wear with or without a strapless bra. There is a grip on the top seam which is great added protection from falling. I looove staples like this for my closet and I will definitely be buying more colors!
I’ve ordered 3 sets of these. They’re so good. Flattering, supportive, they don’t roll down cause there’s a little silicon strip at the top. Thick material and not see through. Highly recommend

Color is just like photo Not a to super tight fit Soft material It does have a weird glue like smell but a lot of stuff that's a ribbed material has that weird smell. It's pretty easy to get rid of. I'm a 34 DD and it doesn't hold very well somi would consider down sizing .
The material is GREAT but will definitely need to size down. I normally wear a large but I think I can get away with a small or medium.
I bought these because I really wanted a good basic that was easy to style and these did not disappoint. The quality is great! Definitely recommend!
